thread.title: SauceBox's Mermaid Life Seashell Eye Shadow Palette Beauty
thread.title_full: SauceBox's Mermaid Life Seashell Eye Shadow Palette | POPSUGAR Beauty

author: Terry Carter
title: SauceBox's Mermaid Life Seashell Eye Shadow Palette Beauty
text:
A post shared by SauceBox cosmetics (@sauceboxcosmetics) on Mar 15, 2017 at 3:11pm PDT
SauceBox Cosmetics' latest eye shadow palette was made with mermaids in mind. The seashell palette, aptly named Mermaid Life Palette , comes with seven creamy colors in foil finish and two different highlights, including a matte shade to help you unleash your inner mermaid. Some of the vibrant eye shadow colors include gold, blue, burnt orange, green, and purple.
If you want to get your fins on this, you'll have to preorder the palette before 8 p.m. PT on March 15. You'll also receive a free mermaid brush to match your new seashell eye palette made out of recycled materials.
Read on to see swatches of every single eye shadow even Princess Ariel would obsess over.
Related:
We Can't Wait to Get Our Fins — Er, Hands — on These Mermaid Makeup Brushes
A post shared by SauceBox cosmetics (@sauceboxcosmetics) on Mar 14, 2017 at 1:14am PDT
